title: Why Do Dongles SUCK? - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Krazy Ken encountered a predicament about computer video dongles. This mystery leads to the question: why do dongles suck? Watch Krazy Ken tell the story of how he battled his CONVERSION TECHNOLOGY, on today's episode.  Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for new content!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #52 - Why Do Dongles SUCK?  Contact the CC    Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.) Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.
